1.0.3.en: Add Korean translations for button press triggers

1.0.7.en: Refactor occupancy sensor flow conditions and triggers.

1.0.8.en: Add DALI level control capabilities and scene management features.

1.0.9.en: Enhance README files with detailed feature descriptions and device support.

1.0.10.en: Refactor DALI level handling in dimmable light and light group drivers.

1.1.0.en: Add fade time functionality for brightness and DALI level adjustments in dimmable light and light group drivers; implement new flow actions for setting brightness and DALI levels with fade time.

1.1.1.en: Update scene controller device name to include Korean translation for improved localization.

1.1.2.en: Add DALI controller support with new actions for setting group and light max levels

1.1.3.en: Update README to clarify DALIHub requirements.
